decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policy B1, Replacement UDP Policy 4.1. | Notwithstanding the details of the extension shown on the submitted plans, permission is granted subject to the additional depth (1.7m approx.) to the rear of the existing rear extension being removed. Details of the amendment to the depth of the extension shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority prior to any part of the development being commenced, and the development shall be implemented only in accordance with the revised details as may be approved.  REASON:   In the interest of the amenity of neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policies B1, B5, H8, ES2, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.5, 5.9.
description: Single storey rear extension to house
